title: Casual Victorian/Nouveau serif in bridal site
content:
Not my cup of tea, but an ID would help a colleague greatly. Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417042344im_/http:/typophile.com/files/advantage_bridal_4700.jpg)
author: marcox

comments.content:
"Advantage" = [Harrington](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417042344/http:/www.identifont.com/show?1ND)

Note: A TrueType version of this font is provided free with the Microsoft Office Value Pack (Macintosh).

Also, [Shareware versions](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417042344/http:/www.abstractfonts.com/font/11869) available.

I think this also goes by the name Hermosa.

- Mike Yanega
